amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of the Bureau of Prisons to conduct a study to evaluate the growth and development of private prisons, the training qualifications of personnel, and the security procedures of the facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the Director of the Bureau of Prisons to conduct a study to evaluate the growth and development of private prisons, the training qualifications of personnel, and the security procedures of the facilities. The study shall be submitted to the Committees on the Judiciary of the House and Senate 270 days after enactment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
